channel.title: How do i add so only members can wield a wep?
channel.description: ok. how can i make it so that a player who doesnt got membership on my server cant wield a weapon :confused: i realy need some help

item.title: How do i add so only members can wield a wep?
item.dc:creator: @sparkz2k7 sparkz2k7
item.description:
@sparkz2k7 wrote:

Omgimjack is after Posts , Why u trying to be high grade when u can’t help peepz?

Anyways…

Its Abit Weird Ur wanting only membs to weild weps but,
Try Searching For :

][=64567][]v)_public boolean { if player rights = 0 and member status = 0 `+{}

Simply Look for one with “Weapons” And change member status bit… Good Luck
